ReportBundle.ReportXML: <Report ReportGID="8f5bad0b-70b8-4ca2-a4d0-32ed1d983366" ReportUseType="2" ReportType="5" ReportName="Current Inventory Summary by Location" Description="Current Inventory by Pounds/Tons with Location" CreatedDT="2013-11-06T09:52:58.397" ModifiedDT="2014-05-19T15:07:20.887" ModifiedBy="VAS" ConcurrencyTS="AAAAAAAAJ4w=" ReportVersion="3" />

ReportQuery.ReportQueryText:
<QueryBundle> <QueryText>from o in ( from iil in ingLocs join ing in ings on iil.InventoryItemGID equals ing.InventoryItemGID join ip in ingProjectionsAF on ing.InventoryItemGID equals ip.InventoryItemGID join pa in projectionAF on iil.InventoryItemLocationGID equals pa.InventoryItemLocation.InventoryItemLocationGID into pag join pd in projectionDM on iil.InventoryItemLocationGID equals pd.InventoryItemLocation.InventoryItemLocationGID into pdg from projAF in pag.DefaultIfEmpty() from projDM in pag.DefaultIfEmpty() where iil.InventoryItem.Inactive == false && iil.Location.Inactive == false && iil.Inactive == false {false} select new { CompanyName = iil.InventoryItem.Company.CompanyName, IngredientName = iil.InventoryItem.InventoryItemName, LocationName = iil.LocationName, Description = iil.InventoryItem.Description, ing.IngredientType.IngredientTypeName, iil.TrackingEnabled, IsPremix = ing.MadeByRecipeGID != Guid.Empty, IsInUse = projAF != null, AsTestedDM_Pct = iil.AsTestedDMPct, AsPurchased_DMPct = iil.AsPurchasedDMPct,
// On-hand values OnHandAF_MQty = iil.AFQuantityOnHand, OnHandAF_LQty = iil.AFQuantityOnHandLarge, OnHandDM_MQty = iil.DMQuantityOnHand, OnHandDM_LQty = iil.DMQuantityOnHandLarge, OnHandValue = iil.AFFifoCost, OnHandCostPerAF_MQty = iil.AFFifoCostPer, OnHandCostPerAF_LQty = iil.AFFifoCostPerLarge, OnHandCostPerDM_MQty = iil.DMFifoCostPer, OnHandCostPerDM_LQty = iil.DMCostPerLarge, DaysLeft = iil.ProjectedDaysLeft,
// Ingredient summary IngredientOnHandAvgCostPerAF_MQty = ing.InventoryItemLocations.Any(il => il.Inactive == false && il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0) ? ing.InventoryItemLocations.Sum(il => il.Inactive == false && il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.AFFifoCost : 0) / ing.InventoryItemLocations.Sum(il => il.Inactive == false && il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.AFQuantityOnHand : 0) : ing.InventoryItemLocations.Where(il => il.Inactive == false).Count() > 0 ? ing.InventoryItemLocations.Where(ingLoc => ingLoc.Inactive == false).Average (il => il.AFFifoCostPer) : 0,
IngredientOnHandAvgCostPerAF_LQty = ing.InventoryItemLocations.Any(il => il.Inactive == false && il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0) ? ing.InventoryItemLocations.Sum(il => il.Inactive == false && il.AFQuantityOnHandLarge > 0 ? il.AFFifoCost : 0) / ing.InventoryItemLocations.Sum(il => il.Inactive == false && il.AFQuantityOnHandLarge > 0 ? il.AFQuantityOnHandLarge : 0) : ing.InventoryItemLocations.Where(il => il.Inactive == false).Count() > 0 ? ing.InventoryItemLocations.Where(il => il.Inactive == false).Average(il => il.AFFifoCostPerLarge) : 0,
IngredientOnHandAvgCostPerDM_MQty = ing.InventoryItemLocations.Any(il => il.Inactive == false && il.DMQuantityOnHand > 0) ? ing.InventoryItemLocations.Sum(il => il.Inactive == false && il.DMQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.DMFifoCost : 0) / ing.InventoryItemLocations.Sum(il => il.Inactive == false && il.DMQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.DMQuantityOnHand : 0) : ingLocs.Where(il => il.Inactive == false).Count() > 0 ? ingLocs.Where(il => il.Inactive == false).Average(il => il.DMFifoCostPer) : 0,
IngredientOnHandAvgCostPerDM_LQty = ing.InventoryItemLocations.Any(il => il.DMQuantityOnHand > 0) ? ing.InventoryItemLocations.Sum(il => il.DMQuantityOnHandLarge > 0 ? il.DMFifoCost : 0) / ingLocs.Sum(il => il.DMQuantityOnHandLarge > 0 ? il.DMQuantityOnHandLarge : 0) : ing.InventoryItemLocations.Where(il => il.Inactive == false).Count() > 0 ? ing.InventoryItemLocations.Where(il => il.Inactive == false).Average(il => il.DMFifoCostPerLarge) : 0,
IngredientIsInUse = ip.IsInUse,
IngredientLocationCount = ing.InventoryItemLocations.Count(), IngredientHasTrackedLocations = ing.InventoryItemLocations.Any(il => il.TrackingEnabled),
// Projections // Daily values ProjDailyAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projDM.DailyAmount, ProjDailyAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.DailyTon, ProjDailyDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.DailyAmount, ProjDailyDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.DailyTon,
// 30-day values Proj30DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Amount30Days, Proj30DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Ton30Days, Proj30DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Amount30Days, proj30DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Ton30Days,
// 60-day values Proj60DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Amount60Days, Proj60DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Ton60Days, Proj60DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Amount60Days, proj60DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Ton60Days,
// 90-day values Proj90DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Amount90Days, Proj90DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Ton90Days, Proj90DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Amount90Days, proj90DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Ton90Days,
// 120-day values Proj120DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Amount120Days, Proj120DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Ton120Days, Proj120DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Amount120Days, proj120DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Ton120Days,
// 180-day values Proj180DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Amount180Days, Proj180DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Ton180Days, Proj180DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Amount180Days, proj180DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Ton180Days,
// 365-day values Proj365DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Amount365Days, Proj365DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Ton365Days, Proj365DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Amount365Days, proj365DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Ton365Days, } ) {where} select new { o.CompanyName, o.IngredientName, o.LocationName, o.Description, o.IngredientTypeName, o.IsInUse, o.IsPremix, o.TrackingEnabled, o.DaysLeft,
o.AsTestedDM_Pct, o.AsPurchased_DMPct,
// On-hand values o.OnHandAF_MQty, o.OnHandAF_LQty, o.OnHandDM_MQty, o.OnHandDM_LQty, o.OnHandValue, o.OnHandCostPerAF_MQty, o.OnHandCostPerAF_LQty, o.OnHandCostPerDM_MQty, o.OnHandCostPerDM_LQty,
// Ingredient summaries o.IngredientOnHandAvgCostPerAF_MQty, o.IngredientOnHandAvgCostPerAF_LQty, o.IngredientOnHandAvgCostPerDM_MQty, o.IngredientOnHandAvgCostPerDM_LQty, o.IngredientLocationCount, o.IngredientHasTrackedLocations, o.IngredientIsInUse,
// Projected values
// Daily o.ProjDailyAF_MQty, o.ProjDailyAF_LQty, o.ProjDailyDM_MQty, o.ProjDailyDM_LQty,
// 30-day o.Proj30DayAF_MQty, o.Proj30DayAF_LQty, o.Proj30DayDM_MQty, o.proj30DayDM_LQty,
// 60-day o.Proj60DayAF_MQty, o.Proj60DayAF_LQty, o.Proj60DayDM_MQty, o.proj60DayDM_LQty,
// 90-day o.Proj90DayAF_MQty, o.Proj90DayAF_LQty, o.Proj90DayDM_MQty, o.proj90DayDM_LQty,
// 120-day o.Proj120DayAF_MQty, o.Proj120DayAF_LQty, o.Proj120DayDM_MQty, o.proj120DayDM_LQty,
// 180-day o.Proj180DayAF_MQty, o.Proj180DayAF_LQty, o.Proj180DayDM_MQty, o.proj180DayDM_LQty,
// 365-day o.Proj365DayAF_MQty, o.Proj365DayAF_LQty, o.Proj365DayDM_MQty, o.proj365DayDM_LQty }; </QueryText> <PreQueryText>var ings = vas.FeedWatch.Model.Entities.IngredientFactory.Instance.GetAll(null) .Where(ing => ing.InventoryItem.Inactive == false);
var ingLocs = vas.FeedWatch.Model.Entities.InventoryItemLocationFactory.Instance.GetAll(null) .Where(iil => iil.InventoryItem.InventoryItemType == vas.FeedWatch.Model.InventoryItemTypes.Ingredient && iil.InventoryItem.Inactive == false && iil.Location.Inactive == false);
var projectionAF = vas.FeedWatch.Model.Entities.InventoryProjection.GetInventoryProjections(false, false) .Where(il => il.InventoryItemLocation.Inactive == false && il.InventoryItemLocation.InventoryItem.Inactive == false && il.InventoryItemLocation.Location.Inactive == false);
var projectionDM = vas.FeedWatch.Model.Entities.InventoryProjection.GetInventoryProjections(false, true) .Where(il => il.InventoryItemLocation.Inactive == false && il.InventoryItemLocation.InventoryItem.Inactive == false && il.InventoryItemLocation.Location.Inactive == false);
var ingProjectionsAF = from i in ings join p in projectionAF on i.InventoryItemGID equals p.InventoryItemLocation.InventoryItemGID into ip from proj in ip.DefaultIfEmpty() select new { i.InventoryItemGID, IsInUse = proj == null ? false : true };</PreQueryText> </QueryBundle>
